## Software Categories

```{r sw-categories, echo=FALSE}
# Derive counts dynamically from included markdown (USxxx entries)
sw_path <- "unit-operations/unitoperations_sw_en.md"
sw_lines <- readLines(sw_path, warn = FALSE, encoding = "UTF-8")
us_count <- sum(grepl("^- \\*\\*US[0-9]{3}\\*\\*: ", sw_lines))

sw_categories <- data.frame(
  Category = c("Total Software Unit-operations"),
  Count = c(us_count),
  Examples = c("Design, alignment, QC, AI/ML, deployment, etc."),
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)

kable(sw_categories, caption = "Software Unit Operation Overview")
```
